name: Apple AirPods
description: Enjoy crystal-clear sound and seamless connectivity with Apple's AirPods. Featuring voice-activated Siri access and a wireless charging case, these earbuds offer a high-quality listening experience and extended battery life for all-day use.

name: Men Woven Trousers
description: Stylish and comfortable, these woven trousers are designed for everyday wear. Featuring a versatile design, they offer both comfort and functionality, making them a perfect addition to your wardrobe.

name: Men's Sports Shorts
description: Stay cool and comfortable during workouts or casual outings with these men's sports shorts. Made with breathable fabric, these shorts provide maximum movement and comfort for active lifestyles.

name: Gucci Jackie 1961 Small Shoulder Bag
description: This luxurious Gucci shoulder bag features the iconic Jackie 1961 design, made from high-quality leather and adorned with a timeless gold-tone hardware. A must-have for any fashion-forward woman looking to elevate her style.

name: Women's Tech Fleece Joggers
description: These women's joggers are crafted from Nike's premium Tech Fleece material, ensuring warmth and lightweight comfort. Perfect for casual wear or lounging, they offer a modern, athletic look.

name: Men's Joggers
description: Upgrade your wardrobe with these men's joggers from Nike. Featuring a comfortable and breathable fabric, these joggers are perfect for both lounging and active use, offering a sleek, stylish look.

name: Xbox Console
description: Elevate your gaming experience with the Xbox console. Featuring powerful hardware and a vast library of games, this console is the ultimate choice for any gamer looking for high-quality performance and immersive gameplay.

name: Turtle Beach Stealth 700 Wireless Headset
description: Experience next-level sound and comfort with the Turtle Beach Stealth 700 wireless headset. Designed for gaming, it features high-quality audio, a comfortable fit, and a built-in mic for clear communication with your teammates.

name: LTGEM Hard Case for Turtle Beach Stealth 700
description: Protect your Turtle Beach Stealth 700 headset with this durable hard case. Crafted from high-quality materials, it ensures your headset stays safe from scratches, dust, and accidental damage during travel.
